info.description:
|Build Status| |codecov|

Thrifty Builder
===============

Example configuration:

.. code:: yaml

    docker:
      images:
        - name: wtsi-hgi/image-1
          dockerfile: /images/image-1/Dockerfile
          context: /images
        - name: wtsi-hgi/image-2
          dockerfile: /images/image-2/Dockerfile
          # Context assumed to be /images/image-2 
      registries:
        - url: https://docker.io
          username: example
          password: other-example
        
    checksum_storage:
      type: consul
      key: /image-checksums

.. |Build Status| image:: https://travis-ci.org/wtsi-hgi/thrifty-builder.svg?branch=master
   :target: https://travis-ci.org/wtsi-hgi/thrifty-builder
.. |codecov| image:: https://codecov.io/gh/wtsi-hgi/thrifty-builder/branch/master/graph/badge.svg
   :target: https://codecov.io/gh/wtsi-hgi/thrifty-builder
info.name: thriftybuilder
